item.title: Deborah add a quote by Harriet B. Braiker
item.description: "If you are an approval addict, your behaviour is as easy to control as that of any other junkie. All a manipulator need do is a simple two-step process: Give you what you crave, and then threaten to take it away. Every drug dealer in the world plays this game." -- Harriet B. Braiker

item.title: Deborah add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description: "Welcome to the human race. Nobody controls his own life, Ender. The best you can do is choose to fill the roles given you by good people, by people who love you." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Deborah add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "The storms come and go, the waves crash overhead, the big fish eat the little fish, and I keep on paddling. (Varys)" -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Deborah add a quote by Frances Mayes
item.description: "Life offers you a thousand chances... all you have to do is take one." -- Frances Mayes
